document_data.caption: ''Faceted zarbrina gem''
document_data.name: Zarbrina
document_data.mainbody:
{{wikipedia article|Cerussite}}
'''Zarbrina''' was the name given in the ''Realms'' to [[wikipedia:en:cerussite|cerussite]], an extremely soft lead-like mineral, colorless and easily cut into brilliant [[wikipedia:facet|faceted]] gems.
document_data.Description: Due to its softness, this [[Ornamental stones|ornamental stone]] was often used in ceremonial or little-used jewelry, or set in small protective metal claw mounts on sleeves or collar-hems of gowns.
document_data.Powers: Powdered zarbrina could be used as an ingredient for magical [[ink]] when dealing with [[illusion]] magic.
